subject: Belmont Stakes
I'll Have Another (Race Horse)
Horse Racing
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
lead_paragraph: I’ll Have Another’s withdrawal on the eve of the Belmont Stakes left horse racing fans disappointed that the colt’s pursuit of the elusive Triple Crown was over.
snippet: I’ll Have Another’s withdrawal on the eve of the Belmont Stakes left horse racing fans disappointed that the colt’s pursuit of the elusive Triple Crown was over.
